org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common

Class ModuleRoots

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.Roots
      • org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.SourceRoots
        • org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.ModuleRoots

  • public final class ModuleRoots
extends SourceRoots
    Represents a project module roots. It can be used to obtain module roots as Ant properties, FileObject's or URLs. This class is thread safe and listens to the changes in Ant project metadata (see SourceRoots.PROP_ROOT_PROPERTIES) as well as in project properties (see SourceRoots.PROP_ROOTS).
